summary: Completed comprehensive testing of TalkNow platform new features: TURN/STUN servers, rate limiting, email verification, password reset, and premium trial system. All backend APIs working correctly (100% success rate). Frontend UI properly displays all new features including forgot password link, email verification section, and trial activation.
passed_tests: GET /api/chat/ice-servers - returns 8 ICE servers (5 STUN + 3 TURN)
Rate limiting middleware - triggers 429 after ~20 rapid requests
Frontend auth modal shows 'Forgot password?' link and switches modes
Frontend settings page shows email verification section with input/buttons
Frontend chat room interface working with mode selection
Email verification flow UI components functional
Settings page with verification controls and preferences
Chat room with proper trial activation logic
